Title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Overview: Seth Gecko and his younger brother Richard are on the run after a bloody bank robbery in Texas. They escape across the border into Mexico and will be home-free the next morning, when they pay off the local kingpin. They just have to survive 'from dusk till dawn' at the rendezvous point, which turns out to be a Hell of a strip joint.
Tagline: One night is all that stands between them and freedom. But it's going to be a hell of a night.
Keywords: dancing, brother brother relationship, sexual obsession, showdown, sheriff, eroticism, nudity, bank robber, vampire, holy water, siege, stripper, priest, explosion, extreme violence, bank robbery, preacher, hostage situation, crucifix, recreational vehicle, blood spurting, convenience store, female vampire, mexican american border, nightclub entertainer, boa constrictor
production_companies: A Band Apart, Dimension Films, Los Hooligans Productions, Miramax
Cast: George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino, Harvey Keitel
